mdRecord.dcterms:description: "...the Heitman House's steep gables have no projecting eaves, giving it a stark, bold look. In contrast, a trellis-covered porch provides a comforting sense of shelter at the entrance." Legler, At Home on the Prairie, Chronicle Books, 2006 [work]
